name: Blitex - Roll the Ball ( No Ads )
name_original: Blitex - Roll the Ball ( No Ads )
description:
Blitex is a fun, addictive 2D horizontal scrolling game where you roll the ֍ into dangerous platforms, you must stay alive until the final platform to win.
Choose to play as multiple balls by collecting diamonds to unlock new ones. Compete with your friends for the best score.

Don't worry itch.io is super safe, so don't worry about nothing, or if you want to purchase pro version by another way mail me at klendigocci@gmail.com.

Follow me on twitter and facebook . Please support me by sharing this game <3 !!!
